verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w*.
\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou hast blessed thy land: thou hast turned away \w the|strong="H3068"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Jacob.
Thou hast forgiven \w the|strong="H0413"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5315"\w*: thou hast covered \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sins.
Thou hast mitigated \w all|strong="H1571"\w* thy anger: thou best \w turned|strong="H1004"\w* away \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy indignation.
Convert us, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* God \w our|strong="H5750"\w* saviour: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* turn off thy anger \w from|strong="H1004"\w* us.

Wilt thou be angry with us \w for|strong="H0120"\w* \w ever|strong="H0120"\w*: \w or|strong="H0120"\w* wilt thou extend thy wrath \w from|strong="H0120"\w* generation \w to|strong="H0120"\w* generation?

Thou wilt \w turn|strong="H1571"\w*, O God, \w and|strong="H1571"\w* \w bring|strong="H7896"\w* us \w to|strong="H1571"\w* life: \w and|strong="H1571"\w* thy people \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H1571"\w* thee.
Shew \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord, thy mercy; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* grant \w us|strong="H0413"\w* thy salvation.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* what \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w in|strong="H0430"\w* me: \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak peace unto \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H8085"\w*: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* unto \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* unto \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* converted \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* salvation \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* fear \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w that|strong="H7200"\w* glory \w may|strong="H0430"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.
Mercy \w and|strong="H0430"\w* truth \w have|strong="H3117"\w* met \w each|strong="H3117"\w* other: justice \w and|strong="H0430"\w* peace \w have|strong="H3117"\w* kissed.

Truth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sprung \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H8121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* justice hath looked \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* heaven.

\w For|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give goodness: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* yield her fruit.
Justice shall walk before him: and shall set his steps in the way.
